channel.title: Welcome to HOME! :aha: on Xinning
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to HOME! :aha: on Xinning

item.title: SEPHORA
item.description: SEPHORA is a French cosmetics brand founded in 1969. During the past half year at Sephora, I worked as a UED intern in Digital Vnture Department.In there,our team feels like a warm family, creating beauty power and helping customers explore their different facets of beauty.

item.title: 不背单词APP-设计数据分析
item.description: Partners：Lufei Ding , Zhilei Li We focus on data analysis for a specific APP, starting from product positioning, competitive analysis, and user perspective. We analyze the product information architecture,use the HEART model and GSM model to analysis core business paths and speculate on event tracking design.

item.title: Infinite Carbinet
item.description: Background: User research and product/service platform design focused on addressing the issue of zero waste in dormitories, with user research being a central component. 背景：针对宿舍零浪费问题的用户研究与产品和服务平台设计，其中用户研究为核心部分. With the goal of promoting low-carbon dormitories, we aim to address issues such as students finding it difficult to adopt low-carbon lifestyles, complex procedures, and weak motivation.

item.description: Draw # Visual # Photo # Landscape Architecture # graduation project # class work # workshop in Sicily #
